name: Private Horse Riding Tour In Natural Park From Barcelona
description:
Enjoy a private horse riding tour in a Nature Park near Barcelona. You and your group will decide weather you rather enjoy a calm and relaxed riding tour along the trails of the Catalonian landscape or trot and gallop in an exiting experience.
This is the perfect present for your anniversary; you and your partner will enjoy an unforgettable morning between nature and horses on your own.
Are you an expert rider? Then enjoy a sensational riding session adapted to your expertise. You will not need to wait for a group of less experienced riders. Tell us your level and we will make you enjoy it to the max. Our instructors are experienced riders that have competed in Catalan, Spanish and European championships in dressage, jumping and cross-country disciplines.
Are you coming for a hen party or a stag party? No other group will join you, so you will be able to slightly modify the schedule of the tour at your leisure.
We recommend the private option for families! All the members of the family will help us  take care of the ponies and learn how to communicate with the horses. Enjoy a morning with us in the ranch!
